<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81900</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81900</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>7910</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Using Clay in Art Class</string>
            <string language="es">Utilización de la arcilla en la clase de arte</string>
            <string language="ga">Cré a Úsáid sa Rang Ealaíne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verwenden des Lehms in der kunst-Kategorie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Utilisation de l'argile dans la classe d'art</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Usando a argila na classe de arte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Usando argilla nel codice categoria di arte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρησιμοποίηση του αργίλου στην κλάση τέχνης</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Children will learn and appreciate the basics of using clay in the classroom.</string>
            <string language="es">Los niños aprenderán y apreciarán los rudimentos básicos para usar arcilla en la clase.</string>
            <string language="ga">Foghlaimeoidh leanai agus beidh tuiscint níos fearr acu ar bhunphrionsabail úsáide cré sa rang.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Visual Arts</string>
            <string language="es">Artes visuales</string>
            <string language="ga">Amharcealaíona</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kinder erlernen und schätzen die Grundlagen des 
Verwendens des Lehms im Klassenzimmer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les enfants apprendront et apprécieront les 
fondations d'utiliser l'argile dans la salle de classe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As crianças aprenderão e apreciarão os 
princípios de usar a argila na sala de aula.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I bambini impareranno ed apprezzeranno i principi 
fondamentali di usando l'argilla nell'aula.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα παιδιά θα μάθουν και θα εκτιμήσουν τα βασικά της 
χρησιμοποίησης του αργίλου στην τάξη.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sichtkünste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts Visuels</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes Visuais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti Visive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εικαστηκές τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>
          <identifier>

All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
